messages.title: My Priorities for Mid Sussex
messages.content: GET BREXIT DONE AND INVEST IN OUR NHS, SCHOOLS AND POLICE, BOOST THE LOCAL ECONOMY AND IMPROVE OUR INFRASTRUCTURE, A STRONG LOCAL VOICE FOR MID SUSSEX IN PARLIAMENT

messages.title: IT'S A CONSERVATIVE MAJORITY OR A HUNG PARLIAMENT
messages.content: Don't risk five long years of Corbyn in charge

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Get Brexit Done and Invest in Our NHS, Schools and Police
keyPolicies.policyDescription: By voting for a Conservative majority Government we can end the paralysis in Parliament, get Brexit done and move on to other priorities - our NHS, schools and police.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Boost the Local Economy and Improve Our Infrastructure
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Mims will support Mid Sussex's businesses to grow and campaign for better infrastructure for the area to relieve road and rail congestion.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Strong Local Voice for Mid Sussex in Parliament
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Mims lives in Mid Sussex with her daughters and knows the community well. She is able to combine her local knowledge with the experience of getting things done in Westminster as a Government Minister.

mentions.tacticalSituation: At the end of this election, we'll either get a Conservative majority – or a hung parliament. The Lib Dems have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives. So a hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister. SNP to back Labour government only with Scottish independence vote. Corbyn would have to be propped up by the Scottish Nationalists. And they're demanding ANOTHER referendum to break up Britain.

issues.brexitEurope: By voting for a Conservative majority Government we can end the paralysis in Parliament, get Brexit done and move on to other priorities.

endorsements.endorsement: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority.
At the end of this election, we'll either get a Conservative majority – or a hung parliament.
Jo Swinson says no to second Tory alliance
SNP to back Labour government only with Scottish independence vote.
